modules.name: Comparator Stepper
modules.description: Fusion of a comparator and a step generator.

modules.name: Envelope Array
modules.description: Generates 6 related envelopes by interpolating between two shapes. Envelope triggers normal to the right, and retrigger only after a full cycle to produce clock divisions. End of function gates allow for complex patch programming. Accepts 4 channels of polyphony.

modules.name: Penta Sequencer
modules.description: A five step sequencer with five simultaneous outputs and tempo-synced slew.

modules.name: Wave Propagation
modules.description: Makes a series of related decay envelopes from a single trigger. Each node propagates to the neighbor nodes, producing complex and interrelated delay chains to its 24 outputs.
